author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6.  To make the salsa, combine all of the salsa ingredients together in a bowl. To make the tuna, rub the tuna steak with the olive oil then season both sides with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Heat a griddle pan until smoking, then chargrill for two minutes on each side. To serve, place the salsa in the middle of a large plate and place the tuna on top.
ingredients: ½ mango, peeled, stone removed, diced,  1 tbsp clear honey,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  ½ red chilli, finely chopped,  1 tbsp sesame oil,  1 tbsp olive oil,  125g/4½oz tuna steak,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
